message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this generous offer and we both win big before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, let's be fair. We both lose if this drags on. 55/45 seems like a reasonable split.
Bob, time is money! I'm offering you a larger share than last time, but we need to act fast before inflation hurts us both further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than you offered me last round. Take it before inflation makes this whole thing pointless!
